comment: No a globalist is someone who wants to lower American standards and have a one world govt run by an unelected cabal that rules over the super poor with zero rights. The EU is the prototype, now look at Germany, France and England once great productive nations now shitholes with arrests for speech. Tell the truth.

The EU is the prototype, now look at Germany, France and England once great productive nations now shitholes with arrests for speech. Tell the truth.
